product_name: Gear Aid Seam Grip Field Repair Kit
long_description: This Field Repair kit from McNett provides permanent, instant field repairs to Therm-A-Rest(R) mattresses, boots and shoes, outerwear, tents and packs. Kit includes an Expert Field Repair Guide, 1/4 oz. Seam Grip adhesive and sealant, 2 removable Clean Tape(TM) patches and an application brush. Quickly and permanently repairs leaks, cuts and tears.
short_description: This Field Repair kit from McNett provides permanent, instant field repairs to Therm-A-Rest(R) mattresses, boots and shoes, outerwear, tents and packs.
